description: This file contains an implementation of asynchronous functions to generate random IDs using crypto.getRandomValues. It defines utility functions such as 'customAlphabet' for customized ID generation and 'nanoid' for standard ID creation, and exports these functions as a module.

methods.name: customAlphabet
methods.description: Creates a function that generates random IDs of specified length using a custom alphabet, with internal logic to compute a bitmask and step size for randomness.

methods.name: nanoid
methods.description: Generates a random ID string of specified size using a default alphabet and crypto.getRandomValues.
